title: Sen. Patrick Leahy: 'Our Privacy Is Part Of Our Security'
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks to Sen. Patrick Leahy, co-sponsor of the USA Freedom Act, which curtailed phone sweeps by the government. He says he also hopes to limit the collection of Internet records.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
